adrFormatAddress: W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: Vandana from GlamWithGlee worked wonders for my wedding day! From flawless makeup and beautifully styled hair to dressing me up from head to toe, her skills are truly exceptional. The makeup stayed on flawlessly throughout the entire day without a hint of creasing. Vandana's expertise and attention to detail made my special day even more memorable. I highly recommend her for any bride-to-be looking for a magical touch on their wedding day!

text.text: Vandana from GlamWithGlee worked wonders for my wedding day! From flawless makeup and beautifully styled hair to dressing me up from head to toe, her skills are truly exceptional. originalText.text:
Vandana was my HMUA for my engagement shoot and two main wedding events. She was extremely professional, skilled, and very understanding! She really listened to what I wanted for each of the looks and incorporated the feedback. My mom and sister also loved their hair and makeup.

She was able to create looks that were amazing in person and on camera!
She was so great to work with and would recommend her to anyone!

text.text:

originalText.text: Vandana did my hair and makeup for my wedding ceremony and reception and I’ve never felt more like a princess in my whole life. She understood my vision and exceeded expectations on the days of the events. My biggest concern was to make sure I still looked like myself even with all of the makeup, she completely understood what kind of vision I had and made me look so beautiful while still looking like myself. She is so kind and fun to chat with. I will definitely be reaching out to Vandana for any future events I have. She’s the BEST!!!

text.text: Vandana did my hair and makeup for my wedding ceremony and reception and I’ve never felt more like a princess in my whole life. originalText.text:
I was in NYC for a wedding and needed to find someone to do my hair and makeup near my son’s apartment. I found GlamWithGlee online and her reviews were good. I have short gray hair and do not wear a lot of makeup. Vandana did a great job on both! I liked that she listened to what I was saying about not overdoing it but still looking good. I got many compliments from people at the wedding and felt good about it. If you are looking for these services, GlamWithGlee is excellent!
Thank you, Vandana, for helping to make the wedding experience even better than I could have hoped for.

originalText.text: Vandana is amazing at her job! She knows how to make a bride look amazing! I trusted her with my look and she made me look so beautiful than i ever thought I will look! I totally recommend her! ❤️❤️You should go to her for your wedding and you will rock! Also, she is super sweet and kind, something that matters alot to me when im working with them.
